participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Confident and ambitious, she enjoys the finer things in life and is not afraid to express herself.
participant_1.background: I diet a lot. I'm high maintenance. I love listening to Britney Spears. I like to tan in tanning beds. I love spending money.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Creative and reflective, he has learned to navigate life's challenges with resilience and a sense of humor.
participant_2.background: My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I am a recording engineer and own my own studio. I prefer being inside. Whats up, I'm a 46 year old single dad with kids. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year.

content.text: Hi! I just got back from the gym.
